content.description: A zoo sponsored a one-day contest to name a new baby elephant. Zoo visitors deposited entries in a special box between noon (t=0) and 8 P.M. (t=8) . The number of entries in the box t hours after noon is modeled by a differentiable function E for 0 ≤ t ≤ 8  Values of E(t) , in hundreds of entries, at various times t are shown in the table above.
content.question: Use the data in the table to approximate the rate, in hundreds of entries per hour, at which entries were being deposited at time t=6. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

frqParts.text: Use the data in the table to approximate the rate, in hundreds of entries per hour, at which entries were being deposited at time t=6. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
